documentation.description: Set-up JIRA connector, by specifying authentication parameters and connection URI. Specified parameters will be stored in MessageContext.
documentation.sample: <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure"> <with-param name="jira.uri" value="http://myjira.com:8080/jira/"/> <with-param name="jira.username" value="admin"/> <with-param name="jira.password" value="admin"/> </call-template>

parameter.name: jira.password
parameter.description: username of the user used to log in to JIRA.

parameter.name: jira.uri
parameter.description: password of the user used to log in to JIRA.
